creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: half circle shaped pendant on flower link chain; 15 tubes attached to top, rounded edge; cartoon-like animals on border panel around rounded edge include rat, water buffalo, cat(?), bunny, dragon, snake, horse, ram, monkey, duck, dog and pig; middle panel, bird medallion surrounded by dragons; 17 chime-like pieces dangle from bottom edge
dimension: 20 1/4 x 14 x 7/8 in. (51.44 x 35.56 x 2.22 cm) (including dangles)
title: Pendant
